name: Cube Valley (CosmoXD)
description:
Description:

In this video game the only thing you have to do is jump and dodge obstacles but the most important thing is FOLLOW THE CAMERA OR SHE WILL KILL YOU.

Controls:

Move Left: A or Left Arrow

Move Right: D or Right Arrow

Jump: Space or Up Arrow

Special Note:

When I open the video game after launching it, I found some bugs in it, In the next patch (1.1) They will be completely repaired if you find any bug report it.
